item.title: My friend, 61, signed a $20K contract for dental implants. She can’t afford it. Can she fight it?
item.description: “After her room and board is paid at the assisted-living home, she has $9,000 left for the year.”

item.title: I am a 65-year-old single woman with 25 credit cards. How do I cancel them without hurting my credit score?
item.description: “I pay them off each month if I use them and don’t run a balance.”

item.title: We’re in our 70s and have $1.4 million. We pay $1,750 in rent. Will we run out of money in retirement?
item.description: “Our adjusted gross income was $160,000 last year. We both also have fairly good health insurance..”
